name: example-block
title: Example Block
author: @gabimoncha
description: Displays a set of buttons with different variants.

files.content:
import { View } from 'react-native';
import { Button } from '~/components/ui/button';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '~/components/ui/card';

export function MultipleButtons() {
  return (
    <View className="gap-6">
      <Card className="border-border/0 sm:border-border shadow-none sm:shadow-sm sm:shadow-black/5">
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle className="text-center text-xl sm:text-left">Multiple Buttons</CardTitle>
          <CardDescription className="text-center sm:text-left">
            Multiple buttons with different variants
          </CardDescription>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardContent className="gap-6">
          <View className="gap-6">
            <Button onPress={() => {}}>
              Primary Button
            </Button>
            <Button variant="secondary" onPress={() => {}}>
              Secondary Button
            </Button>
            <Button variant="outline" onPress={() => {}}>
              Outline Button
            </Button>
            <Button variant="ghost" onPress={() => {}}>
              Ghost Button
            </Button>
            <Button variant="link" onPress={() => {}}>
              Link Button
            </Button>
          </View>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>
    </View>
  );
}
